card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. ■ Double Breaker ■ Players can't cast spells other than light spells.

card.name: Royal Durian

card.name: Great Cactus

card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, during this turn, no creatures can attack.

card.name: Hydro Commune
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a race. Return any number of your creatures in the battle zone that have that race to your hand. Then return a number of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone equal to or less than the number of creatures you returned to your hand to their owner's hand.

card.name: Balga Raizou, the Super-Heavenly Nova
card.text: ■ Mana Galaxy Vortex evolution—Choose 3 Dragons in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard.
